details.description: NHS Business Services Authority contact number for ordering prepaid prescriptions for 3 or 12 months at a cheaper rate than single prescriptions
details.alternative_title: Contact the order line for prescription prepayment certificates (PPCs)
details.body:
You can buy prescription prepayment certificates (PPCs) from the NHS which may make your prescriptions cheaper.

A 3 or 12 month PPC will cover all your prescriptions for that period, no matter how many you need.

A normal prescription costs £7.65, but a PPC will cost you:

  • £29.10 for 3 months
  • £104 for 12 months

This means if you’re going to buy 4 or more prescriptions in 3 months, or 14 or more prescriptions in 12 months, it may be cheaper to buy a PPC.

If you buy a 12 month PPC, you can pay in 10 monthly instalments.

How to buy

You can buy PPCs online, or call the order line and pay by debit or credit card.

PPC order line

0845 850 0030

You can only get a PPC if you live in England.
